document_data.name: House of Stone and Sword
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Stone and Sword''' was a metalsmith shop located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's destruction.
document_data.Location: The House of Stone and Sword was located in north Zhentil Keep within the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The shop was located in between [[Wizards' Way]] and [[Fortress Street]].
